cs.HC, cs.MA, cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.SD

Reasoning: The paper focuses on developing a system for accurately estimating user orientation for mobile computing applications, which is a topic related to human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The system uses statistical analysis techniques, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.MA). The paper also mentions the use of sensors and sensor fusion, which are topics related to computer vision (cs.CV), robotics (cs.RO), and systems and control (cs.SD).
